io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner

Interface IdCardScanner

  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public IdCardScanner

    Component to scan image, detect ID card of known types, perform image optimization, cropping and (optionally) fields detection and fields' data recognition

    • Method Detail

      • getAcceptedSharpnessScore

        float getAcceptedSharpnessScore()
        Deprecated. 

        Accepted minimal sharpness score. Images with a score less than that will be rejected with RecognitionStatus::ErrorTooBlurry.

        Default is 0

        0 - any image will be accepted. 80 - a good compromise; the recommended setting. 100 - only very sharp images will be accepted.

      • setAcceptedSharpnessScore

        void setAcceptedSharpnessScore(float p)
        Deprecated. 

        Accepted minimal sharpness score. Images with a score less than that will be rejected with RecognitionStatus::ErrorTooBlurry.

        Default is 0

        0 - any image will be accepted. 80 - a good compromise; the recommended setting. 100 - only very sharp images will be accepted.

      • getAcceptedDocumentTypes

        @NotNull
java.util.List<io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdScanResult.DocumentType> getAcceptedDocumentTypes()
        Deprecated. 

        Accepted document types. All other document types will be ignored.

        By default - IdScanResult.DocumentType.DEFAULT_TYPES.

      • setAcceptedDocumentTypes

        void setAcceptedDocumentTypes(@NotNull
                              java.util.List<? extends io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdScanResult.DocumentType> p)
        Deprecated. 

        Accepted document types. All other document types will be ignored.

        By default - IdScanResult.DocumentType.DEFAULT_TYPES.

      • scanBitmap

        @Nullable
IdScanResult scanBitmap(@NotNull
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                  boolean shouldRecognize,
                                  int orientation)
        Deprecated. 

        Scan image to detect ID card and data on it

        Parameters:
        bitmap - image
        shouldRecognize - whether to recognize field and their data on ID card. Defaults to true
        orientation - image orientation. Default is 0

      • scanJpeg

        @Nullable
IdScanResult scanJpeg(@NotNull
                                kotlin.Array[] jpeg,
                                boolean shouldRecognize,
                                int orientation)
        Deprecated. 

        Scan image to detect ID card and data on it

        Parameters:
        jpeg - image in form of jpeg-encoded byte array
        shouldRecognize - whether to recognize field and their data on ID card. Defaults to true
        orientation - image orientation. Default is 0

      • scanNv21

        @Nullable
IdScanResult scanNv21(@NotNull
                                kotlin.Array[] nv21,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                int orientation,
                                @Nullable
                                android.graphics.Rect finderRect,
                                boolean shouldRecognize)
        Deprecated. 

        Scan image to detect ID card and data on it

        Parameters:
        nv21 - image in form of nv21-encoded byte array
        width - image width, pixels
        height - image height, pixels
        orientation - image orientation. Default is 0
        finderRect - if non-null - perform scanning only in given area. Default is null
        shouldRecognize - whether to recognize field and their data on ID card. Defaults to true
